module.title: Labs: ContextHelp
module.description: Collects and displays context help. If switched on, all collected contex help sections will be shown for related HTML elements. This module will automatically try to load these context help files within locales folder: list> - html/app.contexthelp.html - html/[controller]/contexthelp.html - html/[controller]/[action]/contexthelp.html $env->getCaptain()->callHook( 'ContextHelp', 'register', $this, array( 'path' => 'my/example/contexthelp' ) ); Attention: This module needs PHPHtmlParser to be installed. Please use composer to require "paquettg/php-html-parser": "^1.7"!
